Beauty Guru Natural Bright Skin Serum

Brand: Beauty

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: FRACTIONATED COCONUT OIL (COCOS NUCIFERA), JOJOBA (SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS), ROSEHIP (ROSA CANINA), AND YLANG YLANG (CANANGA ODORATA), CARROT SEED (DAUCUS CAROTA), TURMERIC (CURCUMA LONGA), SANDALWOOD (SANTALUM ALBUM), GERANIUM (PELARGONIUM GRAVEOLENS) ESSE

IUM GRAVEOLENS) ESSENTIAL OILS

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
